p: The EVOO, produced during the 2016/17 olive milling, was a blend of three native Apulian cvs: 60% Ogliarola Salentina, 20% Coratina, and 20% Leccino. The EVOO is named “Piana del Lentisco” and is produced and packaged by the oil mill “Frantoio Oleario Melcarne” (Gagliano del Capo, Puglia, Italy).
